column1: Learning github from the Youtube Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0fKg7e37bQE
The Repository to work on is: https://github.com/YulongXieGitHub/TestGitHub.git
get a copy of the repository from the github
switch to cd TestGitHub before [git status]
In Windows when cd to TestGitHub repository
column2: the prompt change to [master +1 ~0 ~0]  where +1 ~0 ~0 are in red.

column1: check what is the difference between the local copy and the github repository
(use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed).
Nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)
3. [git add Test01.csv]: note file name is case sensitive.  (add changes or new files)
Also [+1 ~0 ~0] change from red to green.

4. [git commit -m "adding Test01.csv"]  Locking in the addeed changes and files to the repository.  Commit only lock in the files / changes to the repository but not synch to the online github repository yet.
5. [git push]:  push the changes/files to github.com
